name: bigcode/the-stack
description: The "bigcode/the-stack" dataset is a monumental collection of over 6TB of source code files, licensed under permissive terms, and encompassing 358 programming languages. As part of the BigCode Project, this dataset plays a crucial role in the development of Large Language Models for Code (Code LLMs). By serving as a pre-training dataset, it enables AI systems to generate programs from natural language descriptions and code snippets, paving the way for a more efficient and accessible programming experience.
citeAs: @article{Kocetkov2022TheStack,   title={The Stack: 3 TB of permissively licensed source code},   author={Kocetkov, Denis and Li, Raymond and Ben Allal, Loubna and Li, Jia and Mou,Chenghao and Muñoz Ferrandis, Carlos and Jernite, Yacine and Mitchell, Margaret and Hughes, Sean and Wolf, Thomas and Bahdanau, Dzmitry and von Werra, Leandro and de Vries, Harm},   journal={Preprint},   year={2022} }
creator: bigcode
keywords: source code, code dataset, Pre-training dataset for Code LLMs
